channel.title: scala.js on FrankNeff.com - Technology meets Leadership

item.title: Crossbuilding Scala.js 1.0 and 0.6
item.description: As you may know, Scala.js 1.0.0 just went final. For end-products, the upgrade is rather simple, just bump the plugin version and fix potential compile issues. If you’re maintaining a library, cross-building for 0.6.x and 1.0.x is still a bit tricky, but possible…
